LanguageData.WoodLog_Palm.label: jungle logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Pine.label: spruce logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Pine.description: Raw wood from a spruce tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Spruce is a moderate to low durability softwood.
LanguageData.LumberPalm.label: jungle lumber
LanguageData.LumberPalm.description: Processed jungle lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Jungle tree is a durable wood.
LanguageData.LumberPine.label: spruce lumber
LanguageData.LumberPine.description: Processed spruce lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Spruce is a moderate to low durability softwood.
